mapper.insert: insert into CtrlRecord (ID, StationID, DeviceID, Time, StartState, EndState, Operator) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{deviceID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{endState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CtrlRecord set StationID = #{stationID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, DeviceID = #{deviceID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, StartState = #{startState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, EndState = #{endState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Operator = #{operator,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, StationID, DeviceID, Time, StartState, EndState, Operator from CtrlRecord
